alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:38PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union County through 315 PM PDT... At 238 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Hilgard, or 8 miles southwest of La Grande, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grande, Island City and Hilgard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
